Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Immunodeficiency Syndrome/Deficiency of Humoral Immunity/X-Linked Agammaglobulinemia,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Neoplastic Syndrome/Hereditary Neoplastic Syndrome/X-Linked Agammaglobulinemia
Record.Description: X-linked agammaglobulinemia. An immunodeficiency state characterized (usually) by profoundly low concentrations of serum immunoglobulins of all classes, although occasionally significant amounts of one or more isotypes can be found. The fundamental defect in XLA affects early lineage B cells.
